Generation V.Black: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
Generation V.White: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
Generation V.Black 2: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.
Generation V.White 2: Thought to be an embodiment of the sun, it appeared during a bitterly cold winter and saved Pokémon from freezing.

Generation VI.X: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
Generation VI.Y: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: As it flies, it scatters its flaming scales. It was feared by ancient people, who referred to it as "the rage of the sun."
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: According to legends, it was hatched from a flaming cocoon to save people and Pokémon that were suffering from the cold.

Generation VIII.Sword: Volcarona scatters burning scales. Some say it does this to start fires. Others say it's trying to rescue those that suffer in the cold.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon emerges from a cocoon formed of raging flames. Ancient murals depict Volcarona as a deity of fire.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon scatters burning scales. Most of the danger of these scales is not in their heat—it's in the way they rob the surrounding air of oxygen.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Insular Sea , Challenge Beach , Potbottom Desert ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor , Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle )
